Title: isValidUTF8
Description: Returns 1, if the set of bytes constitutes valid UTF-8-encoded text, otherwise 0.
Returns 1, if the set of bytes constitutes valid UTF-8-encoded text, otherwise 0.
SELECT isValidUTF8('\xc3\xb1') AS valid, isValidUTF8('\xc3\x28') AS invalid;
Examples: SELECT isValidUTF8('\xc3\xb1') AS valid, isValidUTF8('\xc3\x28') AS invalid;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT isValidUTF8('\xc3\xb1') AS valid, isValidUTF8('\xc3\x28') AS invalid;
